This cell contains a code cell that imports the necessary libraries and sets up the Facebook English-to-German MT model. It imports the 'FSMTForConditionalGeneration' and 'FSMTTokenizer' classes from the 'transformers' library, assigns the model name 'facebook/wmt19-en-de' to the variable 'model_name', and initializes the tokenizer and model using the 'from_pretrained' method.

This cell contains a code cell that imports the necessary libraries and sets up the Facebook English-to-German MT model. It imports the 'FSMTForConditionalGeneration' and 'FSMTTokenizer' classes from the 'transformers' library. It also assigns the model name 'facebook/wmt19-en-de' to the variable 'model_name'. Finally, it initializes the tokenizer and model using the 'FSMTTokenizer.from_pretrained()' and 'FSMTForConditionalGeneration.from_pretrained()' methods respectively.

This cell contains a code cell that performs the translation of the sample sentence. It first encodes the input sentence using the tokenizer's 'encode()' method and assigns the result to the variable 'input_ids'. Then, it generates the translation using the model's 'generate()' method, passing the 'input_ids' and the maximum number of new tokens as arguments. The generated output is assigned to the variable 'outputs'. Finally, it decodes the generated output using the tokenizer's 'decode()' method, skipping special tokens, and assigns the result to the variable 'decoded'. The decoded translation is printed.
